fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player to give bread to at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If 3 living players have bread, you will transform into (3870b) Famine.
- Players with bread will starve slower when the Famine begins.
- If there are less than 3 players alive before you transform, you will die and lose the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Successfully give bread to 3 living players and become Famine.
